name: dowsing-machine
effect: Used by trainer outside of battle : Searches for hidden items.
short_effect: Use to find hidden items on the field. AKA Itemfinder.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This high-tech machine shows the location of invisible items. It’s attached to the head when in use.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This high-tech machine shows the location of invisible items. It’s attached to the head when in use.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A high-tech machine that shows the location of invisible items. It’s attached to the head when in use.
